You Are Not With Us! Unless Sbowyer Said So!

Come on folks, we need some orders here. Need stuff to do.
yea wait i have an idea what about if we challge each other intill a order THAT MIGHT JUST TO END OUR BORDOM :3
THAT... is a fantastic idea. Too bad I'm terrible at coming up with ideas.
Well, when you are bored, make a crazy invention, then improve it.
Hello I would like to request a 3 manned rocket to Minmus please, thanks in advance, you can use whatever mods you need to or completely stock, fine by me either way.
I am an aerospace engineer, but I would love to try!

I believe I can tackle that 3 man rocket to Minmus for you, Creator. I've never made it to Minmus myself so this will be very groundbreaking for myself as well. You can probably expect it in a few hours. I'll let you know what mods I've used when I put it up.
May I request a 3-man deep-space explorer, so I can fly to all the planets when 0.17 comes out?

I managed to land on Minmus after only one rocket design, which I'm very surprised and very pleased with. I made it using only 3 stages as well. It had plenty of fuel left in it when I touched down: 1 full tank of fuel for each rocket, more than enough to make it back to Kerbin. I dubbed this rocket the Mn 1-A Polaris. The only mod I used for the creation of this ship was the NovaPunch Pack. I also made it there without using a MechJeb which I am very proud of. I hope you enjoy your new rocket.

Sadly I did not take any screenshots.

[ATTACH]32337[/ATTACH]

EDIT: It's a bit wobbly but it wont tear itself apart. Feel free to add struts between the 2nd and 3rd stages.
Guys, I want you to check the older posts for the old orders I didnt get done, The only one I i got done was the Space Station.
